title: New: Broods – Heartlines
body:
NZ’s finest four team up for this new track.

**Broods** (Caleb & Georgia Nott), Lorde and Joel Little join forces for Heartlines, lifted from the forthcoming Broods record, Conscious. Bold, anthemic pop – it’s not a huge departure from their debut LP, but hey, why change a winning formula?

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.

Bold, anthemic pop – it’s not a huge departure from their debut LP, but hey, why change a winning formula? Like this? Follow our On Repeat \[…\]
